rows.label: tlk70000009_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Me and my big bro have got this
area locked down. None shall pass!
Not even a mouse, or a rat!

rows.label: tlk70000009_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Y'know, it's not just the gate that
we're protecting here. It's the future.
The future of the capital of Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000009_05_msg0003
rows.name:
So, it's worth protecting. It's
as important as marching out
into battle, my brother says.

rows.label: tlk70000009_05_msg0004
rows.name:
To be honest, I'm still a
little bit apprehensive
about meeting the enemy.

rows.label: tlk70000009_05_msg0005
rows.name:
But, it's nothing compared to you
guys. You've gotta get right up in
the enemies' face. That must be tough.

rows.label: tlk70000009_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, I hope that fortune always
favors you in battle! Fare thee well!
